overview: Harry Caine, a blind writer, reaches this moment in time when he has to heal his wounds from 14 years back. He was then still known by his real name, Mateo Blanco, and directing his last movie.
title: Broken Embraces

release_dates.note: Rio de Janeiro International Film Festival
Los Angeles Latino Film Festival & New York Film Festival

cast.name: José Coromina
cast.character: Man Walking the Dog and Greeting Lena's Mother (uncredited)

actors_characters.character: Man Walking the Dog and Greeting Lena's Mother (uncredited)
